articles.author: Louis Chilton
articles.title: The School for Good and Evil shows Netflix still doesn’t know how to do blockbusters - The Independent
articles.description: Despite some flashy special effects and a starry cast, Paul Feig’s new fantasy film has failed to win over critics. We shouldn’t be surprised, writes Louis Chilton – Netflix has never managed to crack the formula for big-budget popcorn moviemaking
